name: Pixel & Poly Puzzle
description:
Pixel & Poly Puzzle is a brand new puzzle game. It provides a brand new way of coloring pictures.

Most of the prevailing color by number puzzle games are pixel art coloring or low poly art (polygon art) coloring. Either the pixel color by number game or low poly (polygon) color by number game takes quite a long time to color a picture. Different from these color by number puzzle games, Pixel & Poly Puzzle makes coloring picture more simple and relaxing. Just hold to draw a straight line in Pixel & Poly Puzzle, and the picture would be revealed and colored according how the straight line fits the picture's outline. The more accurate it fits, the more details and colors of the picture be revealed. The puzzle is solved.

All puzzles / pictures in Pixel & Poly Puzzle is free to play. Pixel & Poly Puzzle at present has more than 250 pages and is panning to make 500 pages in near future update.

Pixel & Poly Puzzle can be played with one hand and simple finger taps. It can be instantly started and instantly stopped and still offers fluent gaming experience. It can be played during a long journey across the Atlantic, or just minutes before a bus arrives.

HOW TO PLAY:
1. Read the shape, figure out its length, and hold to draw a line in a second, then release.
2. More stars and more details if the line you draw covers the outline more perfectly.
3. If the line is too long, draw it again; if the line perfectly fits the shape, ONE Gold crown be awarded for your achievement!

FEATURE:
- Perfect game to kill time.
- Simple rules, easy to play.
- Suitable for all ages.
- Totally free leisure game, play it anywhere any time.
- Sometimes it will surprise you how long it is.
- Often it will surprise you what's in the shape.
- More free puzzles / pages coming!

If you just want some game that is simple, relaxing and fun, and especially you love picture coloring, Pixel & Poly Puzzle is an excellent choice worth trying!
